algorithm_technique: Use a list to track available numbers and a boolean array to mark used numbers.
problem_summary_simple: Design a phone directory to assign, check availability, and release phone numbers.
problem_summary_technical: Manages a pool of available numbers using a list and a boolean array to track usage for O(1) get, check, and release.
time_complexity: init: O(N), get: O(1), check: O(1), release: O(1)
key_insights: A list acting as a stack/queue for available numbers allows O(1) retrieval.
A boolean array is efficient for checking the status of any given number.
Releasing a number involves adding it back to the available pool and updating the status.
